content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Strategy is the set of choices a company makes in order to achieve its objectives. These choices\\r include which products to develop, which market segments to focus on, how to differentiate,\\r how to price, how to position, and more. Product leaders are the guardians of a company's\\r strategy. This course lays out how to develop an effective product strategy. A step-by-step\\r process for creating a smart, thoughtful strategy, and explain how to build support for it.
